heading: Welcome
text: VEC Codebook - comprehensive documentation Vietnam Enterprise Census (VEC) dataset harmonization cleaning process DEPOCEN Research Team.VEC Codebook provides detailed workflows, methodologies, best practices processing Vietnamâ€™s enterprise census data, ensuring data quality reproducibility research policy analysis.Note: version 1.0 codebook, published December 2025.

heading: Key Features
text: VEC Codebook offers comprehensive resources researchers analysts working Vietnamâ€™s enterprise census data:ðŸ”§ Data Cleaning Workflows: Step--step guides harmonizing multi-year VEC datasetsðŸ“Š Variable Documentation: Comprehensive metadata variable dictionariesðŸ—ï¸ Data Structure Overview: Understanding VEC data architecture relationshipsðŸ“ˆ Quality Assurance: Validation methods quality checksðŸ” Research Applications: Examples using cleaned VEC data economic analysis

heading: What is this codebook?
text: codebook provides comprehensive documentation Vietnam Enterprise Census (VEC) dataset harmonization cleaning process. VEC annual comprehensive statistical survey conducted Vietnamâ€™s General Statistics Office (GSO) collect detailed information enterprises cooperatives nationwide. VEC survey serves multiple critical purposes:Economic Policy & Planning:Support economic management, evaluation, forecastingProvide data GDP calculation provincial GRDP estimationContribute national economic development policies plansStatistical Products:Produce â€œWhite Book Enterprises 2025â€ (SÃ¡ch tráº¯ng doanh nghiá»‡p 2025)Generate comprehensive business statistics indicatorsUpdate sampling frames future enterprise surveysSector-Specific Analysis:Compile agricultural, forestry, fisheries statistics enterprise dataSupport sectoral policy development monitoringData Infrastructure:Maintain updated enterprise database statistical purposesProvide reliable data government agencies, researchers, international organizationsSurvey Coverage:Scope: 63 provinces/cities nationwideTarget Population: formal enterprises cooperatives (excluding household activities, political organizations, international bodies)Survey Types: Complete enumeration + sample survey detailed indicatorsReference Period: codebook covers harmonization 22 year VEC datasets (2000-2021).codebook aims help researchers DEPOCEN elsewhere better understand use VEC dataset consistently research consultancy purposes, promoting transparency reproducibility. believe sharing resource broader research community can enhance quality reliability studies utilizing VEC data.

heading: Team and contributors
text: codebook primarily developed DEPOCENâ€™s researchers: Huy Le Vu (PI), Tuong-Vy Phan, Ngoc Anh Nguyen (supervisor). like thank Doan Quang Hung insightfull comments support.grateful comments support DEPOCEN researchers, including Manh-Duc Doan, Quang-thanh Tran, Bui Duc Thinh intern team.

heading: Contact us
text: Please send us comments suggestions, let us know codebook useful way, :depocen@depocen.orghuy.levu@depocen.org

heading: License
text: content codebook licensed Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License, permits non-commercial use, distribution, reproduction medium, provided original work properly cited.Concerning datasets, since data resources publicly available, considered DEPOCENâ€™s property. DEPOCENâ€™s staff can directly access data. data access outside DEPOCEN, may read FAQs details.

heading: 1.1 Overview in line with the VEC Guidelines
text: Viet Nam Enterprise Census nationwide census conducted annually. collects detailed information enterprises cooperatives (including unions cooperatives) order :support evidence-based management, policy design evaluation, compilation GDP/GRDP indicators System National Accounts;support evidence-based management, policy design evaluation, compilation GDP/GRDP indicators System National Accounts;produce official publications Enterprise White Book Cooperative White Book, update business register used sampling frame statistical surveys;produce official publications Enterprise White Book Cooperative White Book, update business register used sampling frame statistical surveys;meet usersâ€™ information needs strictly respecting confidentiality Statistics Law avoiding overlap statistical operations.meet usersâ€™ information needs strictly respecting confidentiality Statistics Law avoiding overlap statistical operations.Key design features relevant codebook include:Geographical coverage: 63 provinces centrally governed cities.Geographical coverage: 63 provinces centrally governed cities.Industry coverage: VSIC 2018 sections, except sections O, T U.Industry coverage: VSIC 2018 sections, except sections O, T U.Observation unit: local establishments enterprises cooperatives, including independent-accounting branches applicable.Observation unit: local establishments enterprises cooperatives, including independent-accounting branches applicable.Identification classification: tax code enterprise code, administrative location (province, district, commune), detailed address, VSIC industry, ownership type, branch information.Identification classification: tax code enterprise code, administrative location (province, district, commune), detailed address, VSIC industry, ownership type, branch information.Reference period: financial year immediately preceding survey date, survey implemented annually according plan General Statistics Office.Reference period: financial year immediately preceding survey date, survey implemented annually according plan General Statistics Office.

heading: 1.2 Data structure
text: According VEC Guidelines, 30 questionaires design multi purpose, used main survey, used sample survey. codebook, focus main survey, Questionnaire 01.Questionnaire 01 (enterprises) core instrument survey, also provides main microdata process codebook. Variables organised blocks mirror content structure Questionnaire 01:Data collected enterprise independent-branch level, unique identifiers allowing longitudinal analysis across years. variables, definitions, coding rules presented following chapters aligned content structure interpretation VEC Guidelines Questionnaire 01.codebook, focus primarily dataset derived Questionnaire 01, main target analysis. table summarises data structure use; questionnaires referenced needed consistency checks additional contextual information.

heading: 2.2 If you just want to use the cleaned data
text:
just want use cleaned data, can access link: . Chose file want download, download local machine. Please, dowload file need, modify anything folder.final data cover 2000 2021, following variables:
- Tax code
- Secondary tax code
- Year (survey/reference year)
- Survey province code
- Survey district code
- Survey commune/ward code
- Year starting production business
- Enterprise operating status
- Type enterprise
- VSIC 2018 4â€‘digit industry code
- VSIC 2007 4â€‘digit industry code
- VSIC 1993 4â€‘digit industry code
- Number employees
- Number female employees
- Total expenses related employees
- Total assets
- Fixed assets
- Historical cost
- Accumulated depreciation
- Construction progress
- Total liabilities
- Total revenue
- Revenue sale goods services
- Net revenue sale goods services
- Cost goods sold
- Reductions revenue
- Financial income
- income
- Profit tax
- Corporate income tax expense
- Import activity (yes/)
- Export activity (yes/)
- import export activitiesIf want check raw name variables raw data, can access data dictionary .

heading: 2.3 If you want to know how we clean the data
text:
want know clean data, can dowload raw data link , follow steps clean data.raw data organized following folder structure: data folder year named â€œVES_yearâ€. folder, plenty dta data file, focus file named â€œdn_year.dtaâ€. data need clean. files, can ignore , update use future.folder dowload â€œ01_rawâ€, also include questionaires year use clean data. available, read carefully understand context data.Now, create new folder project, put raw data questionaires ., need dowload stata script , put project folder.Run setup script setup folder clean data, running script, need set directory project folderI explain script :common issue cleaning survey data spanning multiple years, especially VEC, inconsistency variable names content across years. address , synchronize variable names content across years using Excel file maps variables different years single standardized format.can copy Excel link code download file. structure Excel file shown image :running code , Stata generate 22 -files, one year. -files contain commands synchronize variable names content across years.now use -files standardize data. variable names synchronized, can easily append yearly data create panel dataset using following command:result â€œves_00_21.dtaâ€ file, panel dataset synchronized variable names. However, since survey content may vary year, specific adjustments needed ensure consistency.
use command keep variables interest order desired.Location variables crucial indicate geographical distribution enterprises across communes, districts, provinces. However, variables may vary across years due administrative boundary changes. section currently updated, can still reliably use province-level data, provincial boundaries changed significantly 2000-2021 period.Similarly, enterprise types classified differently different periods. constructed new classification system comprehensive consistent across years. can refer copying link code download Excel file details.command merges enterprise type (lhdn) year new classification, creating new variable named lhdn_dpc.Industrial classification much complex variables due large number industry codes two major revisions: VSIC 2007 VSIC 2018. address creating crosswalk data files map new industry codes old ones, generating three new variables: vsic4_2018, vsic4_2007, vsic4_1993. allows users conveniently choose industry classification suits research purpose.
code quite complex, underlying principle simple.Next, clean variables beginning--year end--year values. principle use rowmean command, handles cases either beginning end value missing.
Additionally, international trade variables like export import converted dummy variables (0 , 1 yes). raw data, variables various formats (import/export value, tax, etc.), simplify dummies. Note interested deep trade analysis, import/export values consistently extracted raw data asked years.cleaning, need label variables easy understanding usage.
code:
# Example folder structure
# 01_raw/       - Raw datasets and questionaires
# 02_temp/      - Temporary files
# 03_clean/     - Cleaned datasets
# 04_output/    - Output files# Example folder structure
# 01_raw/       - Raw datasets and questionaires
# 02_temp/      - Temporary files
# 03_clean/     - Cleaned datasets
# 04_output/    - Output files
# 00_setup.do   - Setup and clean script// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
**# Set Working Directory
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //

* User must uncomment the following line ("global ...") and set the filepath equal to the folder containing this run.do file 
gl MyProject ".../your_project_folder/"
    gl data "$MyProject/data"
        gl raw      "$MyProject/01_raw"
        gl tem      "$MyProject/02_temp"
        gl clean    "$MyProject/03_clean"   
        gl out      "$MyProject/04_output"// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
**# 0. Make the dofile for each year
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //

    import excel "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1z1FoluAF2u6vSx7LM_uHxjLDjmr7d3JHDB1zvJiu-cs/export?format=xlsx", ///
        clear firstrow
    
        drop if Code_name == ""
        
    local N = _N
    
    forval i = 2000/2021 {
        file open myfile using `"$tem/label`i'.do"', write text replace
        
        local renamed_vars ""
        forval iii = 1/`N' {
            local vvvcode = Code_name[`iii']
            local vvv_i = var_`i'[`iii']  
            
            if `"`vvv_i'"' != "" {
                local result = `"ren `vvv_i' `vvvcode'"'
                local renamed_vars "`renamed_vars' `vvvcode'"
                * Ghi dÃ²ng káº¿t quáº£ vÃ o tá»‡p do-file
                file write myfile `"`result'"' _n
            }
        }
        file write myfile `"keep `renamed_vars'"' _n
    
        file close myfile
        }// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
**# 1. Rename raw data for each year and make panel data
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
    
clear all

    tempfile combined_data
    save `combined_data', emptyok replace
    
    forval i = 2000/2021 {
    
        di "Processing year `i'..."
    
        * Load data
        use "$raw/VES_`i'/dn`i'.dta", clear
    
        * Run rename do-file
        do "$tem/label`i'.do"
    
        * Generate year
        gen year = `i'
        
        if year == 2013 {
            gen huyen = .
            gen xa = .
        }
        
        foreach var in tinh huyen xa nganh {
            capture confirm numeric variable `var'
            if _rc {
                destring `var', replace force
                }
            }
        
        * Append safely
        append using `combined_data'
    
        * Save back to tempfile
        save `combined_data', replace
    }
            
    save "$tem/ves_00_21.dta", replace// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
**# 2. Tidy Clean panel data
// -------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
    * ssc install keeporder // if you have not installed this package

    use "$tem/ves_00_21.dta", clear
    
    keeporder   mst mst_2 year                                                                  ///                                                                 
                tinh huyen xa                                                                   ///                                                                     
                namsxkd tthd lhdn lhdn_1 lhdn_2 nganh nganh_cu                                  ///                         
                laodong_dk laodong_ck laodong_nu_ck laodong_nu_dk                               ///                                 
                luong_0 luong_1 luong_2 luong_3                                                 ///                     
                taisan_tong_dk taisan_tong_ck                                                   ///             
                taisan_codinh_dk taisan_codinh_ck ng_dk ng_ck hmlk_dk hmlk_ck xdcb_dk xdcb_ck   ///                                                             
                nophaitra_dk nophaitra_ck                                                       ///         
                tongdoanhthu                                                                    ///
                doanhthubanhang doanhthuthuan giavon giamtru                                    ///                             
                doanhthutaichinh doanhthukhac                                                   ///             
                tongloinhuan thuethunhap                                                        ///         
                loinhuan_lai loinhuan_lo loinhuan_sau_lai loinhuan_sau_lo                       ///                                         
                nhapkhau xuatkhau xuatnhapkhau                                                                  **## 2.1. Clean Location Variables
* Under development**## 2.2. Clean type of enterprises 

    preserve
        import excel "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1z1FoluAF2u6vSx7LM_uHxjLDjmr7d3JHDB1zvJiu-cs/export?format=xlsx&gid=1229044769", ///
            clear firstrow

        tempfile cw_lhdn
        save `cw_lhdn'
    restore

    merge m:1 lhdn year using `cw_lhdn'
        drop if _m == 2
        drop _m**## 2.3. Clean industrial Classification 

    replace nganh = int(nganh/10) if year == 2004 | year == 2005                // need check

    gen vsic4 = int(nganh/10) if year >= 2004
        replace vsic4 = nganh if year <= 2003

    preserve
        use "$tem/cw_vsic_2018_2007_1993", clear
            duplicates drop vsic4_2018, force
        save "$tem/cw_vsic_2018", replace
        
        use "$tem/cw_vsic_2018_2007_1993", clear
            duplicates drop vsic4_1993, force
        save "$tem/cw_vsic_1993", replace
    restore
    
    preserve
        keep if year >= 2019
        ren vsic4 vsic4_2018
        
        merge m:1 vsic4_2018 using "$tem/cw_vsic_2018"
            drop if _m == 2
            drop _m 
        
        tempfile vsic4_2018
        save `vsic4_2018', replace
    restore
    
    preserve
        keep if year <= 2019 & year >= 2006
        ren vsic4 vsic4_2007
        
        merge m:1 vsic4_2007 using "$tem/cw_vsic_2018_2007_1993"
            drop if _m == 2
            drop _m 
        
        tempfile vsic4_2007
        save `vsic4_2007', replace
    restore
    
    preserve
        keep if year <= 2005
        ren vsic4 vsic4_1993
        
        merge m:1 vsic4_1993 using "$tem/cw_vsic_1993"
            drop if _m == 2
            drop _m 
        
        tempfile vsic4_1993
        save `vsic4_1993', replace
    restore
    
    use `vsic4_2018', clear 
        append using `vsic4_2007'
        append using `vsic4_1993'
                
/*  
    import excel "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1z1FoluAF2u6vSx7LM_uHxjLDjmr7d3JHDB1zvJiu-cs/export?format=xlsx&gid=299465942", ///
        clear firstrow
    
            drop if _n >= 668
            destring vsic4_2007 vsic4_1993, replace
            replace vsic4_2007 = int(vsic4_2007/10)
            keep vsic4_2007 vsic4_1993

            duplicates drop vsic4_2007, force
            
        save "$tem/cw_vsic_2007_1993", replace
        
        
    import excel "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1z1FoluAF2u6vSx7LM_uHxjLDjmr7d3JHDB1zvJiu-cs/export?format=xlsx&gid=567783578", ///
        clear firstrow
    
            drop if _n >= 471
            keep vsic4_2018 vsic4_2007
            
            duplicates drop vsic4_2007, force       

                merge 1:1 vsic4_2007 using "$tem/cw_vsic_2007_1993"
                    drop if _m == 2
                    drop _m
        
        save "$tem/cw_vsic_2018_2007_1993", replace
                    
*/  **## 2.4. Clean labor indicators

        **### Total number of labor
        egen laodong = rowmean(laodong_dk laodong_ck)               

        **### Total number of female labor
        egen laodong_nu = rowmean(laodong_nu_dk laodong_nu_dk)              
                
        **### Total expenses related to labor
        egen luong = rowtotal(luong_1 luong_2 luong_3)
            replace luong = luong_0 if luong_0 != . 

    
**## 2.5. Clean Asset indicators

        **### Total assets
        egen tongtaisan = rowmean(taisan_tong_dk taisan_tong_ck)                

        **### Fixed Asset
        if (year >= 2000 & year <= 2011) | year == 2019 | year == 2020 {
            egen tscd = rowmean(taisan_codinh_dk taisan_codinh_dk)              
        }
        
        **### Historical cost, accumulated depreciation, onstruction in progress (CIP)
        foreach var in ng hmlk xdcb {
            egen `var' = rowmean(`var'_dk `var'_ck)                             
        }
    
        replace xdcb = 0 if xdcb == .
        replace tscd = ng - hmlk + xdcb if  (year >= 2012 & year <= 2018) | year == 2021
        
        **### liabilities
        egen nophaitra = rowmean(nophaitra_dk nophaitra_ck)                     
            
**## 2.6. Clean business result indicators 
            
        **### Total profit before tax
        replace tongloinhuan = loinhuan_lai - loinhuan_lo if year == 2000 | year == 2001


**## 2.7. Clean trade indicator 

        replace nhapkhau = 0 if nhapkhau == . | (nhapkhau == 2 & year == 2004)  
        replace xuatkhau = 0 if xuatkhau == . | (xuatkhau == 2 & year == 2004)  
        
        replace nhapkhau = 1 if nhapkhau != 0   
        replace xuatkhau = 1 if xuatkhau != 0 

        replace xuatnhapkhau = 0 if xuatnhapkhau == 2 | xuatnhapkhau == .
        replace xuatnhapkhau = 1 if xuatkhau == 1 | nhapkhau == 1
        
**## 2.8. Keep interested variables 
        
    keeporder   mst mst_2 year                                                                  ///                                                                 
                tinh huyen xa                                                                   ///                                                                     
                namsxkd tthd lhdn vsic4_2018 vsic4_2007 vsic4_1993                              ///                         
                laodong laodong_nu                                                              ///                                 
                luong                                                                           ///                     
                tongtaisan                                                                      ///             
                tscd ng hmlk xdcb                                                               ///                                                             
                nophaitra                                                                       ///         
                tongdoanhthu                                                                    ///
                doanhthubanhang doanhthuthuan giavon giamtru                                    ///                             
                doanhthutaichinh doanhthukhac                                                   ///             
                tongloinhuan thuethunhap                                                        ///         
                nhapkhau xuatkhau xuatnhapkhau                                                                  

    save "$tem/tiny_data.dta", replace* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
**# 3. Label variables and label value 
* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

    iecodebook apply using "$tem/codebook_tiny_data.xlsx"
    
    save "$cle/ves_00_21.dta", replace 
    
    forval val = 2000/2021 {
        preserve
            keep if year == `val'
            save "$cle/ves_`val'.dta", replace 
        restore
    }

heading: Additional resources
text: [Äiá»n cÃ¡c tÃ i nguyÃªn bá»• sung: links, documents, v.v.]
